title: 3. LLM to ROS Actions: The Cognitive Core
description: We can now turn spoken commands into text. The next crucial step in our VLA pipeline is to convert this natural language text into a sequence of executable robot actions. This is the cognitive core of our robot's intelligence, typically handled by a Large Language Model (LLM).
